resources.string: I am worthy of love and respect.
I am capable of achieving my goals.
I trust my intuition and make wise decisions.
I am strong and resilient.
I am grateful for everything in my life.
I believe in myself and my abilities.
I radiate positivity and attract good things.
I am confident in my unique talents and skills.
I am deserving of happiness and success.
I am surrounded by supportive and loving people.
I am in control of my thoughts and emotions.
I forgive myself and others easily.
I am worthy of abundance and prosperity.
I am constantly improving and growing.
I am at peace with myself and my past.
I am always learning and expanding my knowledge.
I am grateful for my body and treat it with kindness.

I trust the universe to guide me towards my path.
I am open to new opportunities and experiences.
